translation.en: God himself commands you,
depart from the body of Hannah Grace, you demon,
translation.es: ...que abandones el cuerpo de Hannah Grace, demonio...

translation.en: along with every satanic power of the enemy,
translation.es: ...junto con cualquier poder satánico del enemigo...

translation.en: along with every specter from hell.
Stop!
Hannah, I know you're in there.
You have to fight, baby.
Fight it, Hannah.
Fight it. Fight it, Hannah.
You have to fight.
Baby, it's me.
Dad. Daddy's here, baby.
Dad. Honey. Baby.
Dad.
You have to fight.
In the name of the Father, in the name of the Son,
translation.es: En nombre del Padre, en nombre del Hijo...

translation.en: in the name of the Holy Spirit.
Hannah, stop!
No.
DEMON: Your whore daughter is mine.
translation.es: La puta de tu hija es mía.

translation.en: She's mine forever.
Forgive me.
LISA : Meg. Hey, it's Lisa. I just talked to Dr. Lewis
translation.es: ¿Meg? Soy Lisa. Hablé con el Dr. Lewis y te quiere conocer.

translation.en: and you're good to go, so maybe you can
translation.es: ¿Meg? Soy Lisa. Hablé con el Dr. Lewis y te quiere conocer. ¿Quizá puedas venir esta tarde? Bueno, adiós.

translation.en: come in this afternoon. Okay, bye.
translation.es: ¿Quizá puedas venir esta tarde? Bueno, adiós.

translation.en: Hey.
You look nervous. Are you okay?
It's a job interview. I think I'm supposed to be nervous.
translation.es: Es una entrevista de trabajo. Debería estar nerviosa.

translation.en: Okay. Come on, let's go get a coffee.
LISA: This will be good.
We'll go to meetings in the morning after our shifts end
translation.es: Iremos a juntas por la mañana cuando terminemos los turnos y...

translation.en: and I'll be three floors up, so if you need anything...
translation.es: ...estaré tres pisos arriba, por si necesitas algo.

translation.en: You know?
Thank you for this.
Don't thank me yet. You still have to meet Dr. Lewis.
translation.es: No me agradezcas todavía. Aún tienes que conocer al Dr. Lewis.

translation.en: DR. LEWIS: This job is not for everyone.
translation.es: Este trabajo no es para todos.

translation.en: We've had three overnight intake assistants in the last six months alone.
translation.es: Llevamos tres asistentes de recepción en los últimos seis meses.

translation.en: Because of the hours?
No, because it's a thankless, solitary position.
translation.es: Es un trabajo ingrato y solitario.

translation.en: The smell. You never get used to the smell.
translation.es: El olor. Nunca te acostumbras al olor.

translation.en: I was a cop. I'm totally used to bad smells.
translation.es: Fui policía. Estoy acostumbrada a los malos olores.

translation.en: Lisa mentioned that there were issues.
Yes. There were issues. But I'm much better now.
translation.es: Sí, tuve problemas, pero ya estoy mejor.

translation.en: Well, she assured me that you could handle the job.
translation.es: Ella me aseguró que puedes con el trabajo.

translation.en: Is it something you think you can handle? I can handle it.
translation.es: -¿Crees que puedas con él? -Puedo con él.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Going down.
It gets to you after a while, being here. People get creeped out.
translation.es: Te afecta después de un tiempo. La gente se pone nerviosa.

translation.en: Before you know it, their imaginations are running wild,
they're hearing things go bump in the night.
Not me.
I believe when you die, you die.
translation.es: Yo creo que cuando te mueres, se acabó.

translation.en: End of story.
Good.
COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
At night, you can't get in or out without swiping this card.
translation.es: No puedes entrar o salir sin deslizar esta tarjeta.

translation.en: If you lose it, hospital security has to let you in. They will not be happy.
translation.es: Si la pierdes, los guardias tienen que abrirte. No les dará gusto.

translation.en: Most of the lights are on a sensor. The rest you have to switch on manually.
translation.es: La mayoría de las luces tienen sensor. Las otras se encienden a mano.

translation.en: There are a lot of files that need to be entered into the system.
translation.es: Hay que ingresar muchos archivos al sistema.

translation.en: I hope you don't mind data entry. No, not at all.
Men's room is down there, women's room is down there,
translation.es: El baño de hombres está allá, el de mujeres por allá...

translation.en: and down there to the left is the incinerator room for cremation.
translation.es: ...y allá, a la izquierda, está el horno para la cremación.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Intake bay.
DR. LEWIS: This intake bay is for drop- offs only.
translation.es: Esta área es solo para entregas.

translation.en: No drop- off, no access.
translation.es: Si no hay entrega, no hay acceso.

translation.en: And you never leave the premises while you're on duty. No exceptions.
translation.es: No puedes salir mientras estés de servicio. Sin excepciones.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
Well, you bring the cadaver up from the intake bay,
translation.es: Subes el cadáver del área de entregas...

translation.en: and take it into the receiving room, which is over here.
translation.es: ...y lo llevas a la sala de recepción, que está por aquí.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Image captured.
First you take an overview of the body and then close- ups
translation.es: Primero una toma general del cuerpo y después acercamientos...

translation.en: of each individual injury.
COMPUTER: Image captured. All right, you try.
Rigor mortis makes a corpse difficult to fingerprint.
translation.es: El rigor mortis dificulta tomar las huellas del cadáver.

translation.en: Now, if you press on the knuckle, it will extend
translation.es: Si oprimes el nudillo, el dedo se extiende...

translation.en: the finger, and make it easier to handle.
Gently roll.
COMPUTER: Scanning.
This doohickey sends the prints to a crime database.
translation.es: Esto envía las huellas a una base de datos de criminales.

translation.en: Green means they're ready to go. Red means they're not.
translation.es: Verde significa que están listas, rojo que no lo están.

translation.en: Yeah.
Green...
Green means go.
Thanks, Moe. You bet, Doc.
The shift starts tomorrow night at 11, goes to 7 in the morning.
translation.es: El turno empieza mañana a las 11:00 hasta las 7:00 a.m.

translation.en: Any problems with that? Not at all.
Well, thank you for the opportunity.
I promise you won't be disappointed.
translation.es: Le prometo que no lo decepcionaré.

translation.en: Welcome to the team.
Thanks.
Hey, do you need to see my I.D.?
Do you work here? In the morgue. I'm Megan.
Then no.
Hey, I'm Dave.
Megan. Nice to meet you.
And, you know, welcome to the graveyard shift.
translation.es: Y bienvenida al turno de noche.

translation.en: Thanks.
COMPUTER: Morgue.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
Who are you? Where's Larry?
I don't know who Larry is, but I'm Megan.
translation.es: No sé quién es Larry, pero soy Megan.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Morgue.
You've got to be the right kind to stomach a job like this.
translation.es: Hay que tener cierto carácter para aguantar este trabajo.

translation.en: Personally...
I'm not what you'd call a people person.
Dead's the way I like them.
COMPUTER: Image captured.
COMPUTER: Scanning.
Green means go.
Hey.
Goddamn it, Dave. Sorry.
Not funny.
I didn't mean to. I honestly just came down to check on you.
translation.es: No fue adrede. Vine a ver cómo estabas.

translation.en: Shit. I feel like an asshole. Forgive me?
translation.es: Mierda. Me siento como un idiota. ¿Me perdonas?

translation.en: I'll never do it again.
Really not funny.
Hey.
MAN 1: Why didn't you shoot me? MAN 2: Megan, do something.
translation.es: -¿Por qué no me disparaste? -Megan, haz algo.

translation.en: MEGAN: I don't know what triggers it, really.
A lot of things, I guess.
But I still have nightmares of what happened.
translation.es: Aún tengo pesadillas sobre lo que pasó.

translation.en: Put your hands up!
Me just...
standing there...
doing nothing.
I just freeze up and I can't move.
translation.es: Me paralizo y no puedo moverme.

translation.en: MAN : Officer down. Officer down.
It's okay. I've got you. I've got you.
I want it so bad sometimes.
translation.es: A veces me muero de ganas.

translation.en: The drink and the pills, I want them so bad.
translation.es: De beber y tomar pastillas. Me muero de ganas.

translation.en: Thank you, Megan, for sharing.
MAN: Hey.
I just, um, need the rest of my stuff.
translation.es: Necesito el resto de mis cosas.

translation.en: My shift just ended, but if this is a bad time...
translation.es: Acabé mi turno, pero si es mal momento...

translation.en: No. No, come in.
And you're still in your pajamas because...?
I started a new job last night. A night job.
translation.es: Empecé un nuevo empleo anoche. Es nocturno.

translation.en: That's great.
Doing what?
Overnight intake assistant at the morgue.
translation.es: Asistente de recepción nocturna en la morgue.

translation.en: It's better than it sounds.
translation.es: Es mejor de lo que suena.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm basically running the place at night, all on my own.
translation.es: Dirijo todo el lugar de noche. Yo sola.

translation.en: Are you sure that's a good idea, you know...
spending so much time alone right now?
Actually, I do. You know, it keeps me from going out at night
translation.es: De hecho, sí. Así evito salir de noche...

translation.en: doing things I might regret in the morning.
translation.es: ...y hacer cosas de las que me pueda arrepentir.

translation.en: It worked for Lisa and she thinks it could work for me, too.
translation.es: La ayudó a Lisa. Cree que me puede ayudar a mí.

translation.en: Lisa? My AA sponsor.
The nurse at the hospital.
She says it keeps her out of trouble working the night shift.
translation.es: Dice que le evita problemas trabajar de noche.

translation.en: So, when a job opened up at the morgue, she thought of me.
translation.es: Cuando se abrió el puesto en la morgue, pensó en mí.

translation.en: Yeah, still, too much time alone is never good for anyone.
translation.es: Tanto tiempo sola no es bueno para nadie.

translation.en: Says the guy who moved out.
translation.es: Lo dice el novio que se fue.

translation.en: You didn't give me much of a choice.
That's not true, Andrew. You know that's not true.
translation.es: No es verdad. Tú sabes que no.

translation.en: Since when are you concerned about the truth?
I didn't come to...
I should go.
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
I forgot my key. Could you open the door?
You don't work here.
Yes, I do. Just let me in.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Solo... déjame entrar.

translation.en: Sir, back away from the door. No. No. No.
Sir. Let me in!
I'm going to call security. Back away from the door.
translation.es: Voy a llamar a Seguridad. Apártese de la puerta.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Morgue. MAN: Let me in!
Let me in!
MAN : Security.
Hey, I had a homeless guy at the intake bay.
translation.es: Había un vagabundo en el área de entregas.

translation.en: MAN: Thanks for the heads- up. Yeah, we get that a lot.
translation.es: Gracias por avisarnos. Pasa con frecuencia.

translation.en: Yeah.
COMPUTER: Arrived at intake bay.
Drop- off? Hey, yeah.
Ooh. You're new here.
Megan. Randy.
Could you give me a hand? I'm all alone tonight.
translation.es: ¿Me das una mano? Estoy solo esta noche.

translation.en: Sorry. I can't leave the premises.
translation.es: Lo siento, no puedo salir de aquí.

translation.en: Yes. Yeah. Stickler on the rules.
But I'll tell you right now,
if you don't help me get this thing inside,
translation.es: ...si no me ayudas a meter esta cosa...

translation.en: it's going to start to rot and decay. It's just going to blow up like a puffer fish.
translation.es: ...se va a echar a perder y se va a inflar como un pez globo.

translation.en: And then we're both going to lose our jobs.
Unless...
What do you think? All right, okay. Fine.
Yeah? Yeah.
You're the best. My partner called in sick. Strep throat.
translation.es: Eres lo máximo. Mi compañero se reportó enfermo. Estreptococo.

translation.en: Which is 100 percent grade- A bullshit because--
translation.es: Lo cual es una mentira de primera porque...

translation.en: Do you want to grab that side? Yeah.
He is holing up with his psycho ex- girlfriend.
It seems like he should be making some new friends.
Yeah, I think he should probably pick a better psycho ex- girlfriend next time.
translation.es: Debería escoger mejor a su futura exnovia psicópata.

translation.en: So, I want to say thank you, by the way,
because the guy who used to have this job would never have just done that.
translation.es: El tipo que antes tenía este empleo jamás me hubiera ayudado.

translation.en: He was a prick. Horrendous breath.
translation.es: Era un imbécil. Con muy mal aliento.

translation.en: How long have you been here? I just started.
MEGAN: What happened? RANDY: Oh, yeah, it's a bad one.
translation.es: -¿Qué le pasó? -Sí, es de los feos.

translation.en: The cops found her in an alley. One, two, three.
translation.es: La policía la encontró en un callejón. Uno, dos, tres.

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah, so the guy was still slicing her.
translation.es: El tipo aún la estaba rebanando.

translation.en: He took off. They still haven't found him.
translation.es: Huyó. Todavía no lo han encontrado.

translation.en: Did they find out who he was? No clue.
Yeah, that's what it said on her I.D.
I told you it was bad.
That's not even the insane thing. The insane thing is
translation.es: Eso ni siquiera es lo loco. Lo loco es...

translation.en: they found chloroform by her body.
translation.es: ...que encontraron cloroformo al lado de su cuerpo.

translation.en: What kind of a lunatic drugs a girl, smashes her head in,
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de lunático droga a una chica, le aplasta la cabeza...

translation.en: and then tries to burn her body after she's been dead?
translation.es: ...y luego trata de quemarle el cuerpo después de estar muerta?

translation.en: I'll tell you who it is. It's someone trying to send a message.
translation.es: Te diré quién es. Alguien que quiere enviar un mensaje.

translation.en: It could have been her pimp. It might have been a drug dealer.
translation.es: Quizá su proxeneta, quizá un traficante.

translation.en: It could have been a sex thing.
Thanks, Randy. I can take it from here. You got it. Yeah.
All right.
Thanks for the help, Megan.
Yeah.
COMPUTER: Intake bay. It gets easier. I promise.
translation.es: Se te hará más fácil, te lo prometo.

translation.en: Thanks.
It's all part of the job.
COMPUTER: Error. Unable to load image.
COMPUTER: Error.
Unable to load image.
What?
All right.
Username.
Password.
Bye- bye, Megan.
Password.
Brown.
Get out of here.
You're losing your mind.
It's freaking hot.
Dave?
Dave, you promised.
Oh, my God.
If you scream, I will have to slit your throat.
translation.es: Si gritas, te voy a tener que cortar el cuello.

translation.en: Do you understand? Yes.
Do you understand?
Come on. MAN : Security.
There's someone down here. Call the police now.
translation.es: Hay alguien aquí abajo. Llamen a la policía.

translation.en: MAN: What?
MAN: As we forgive those who trespass against us.
translation.es: ...como perdonamos a aquellos que nos ofenden.

translation.en: And lead us not into temptation,
translation.es: Y no nos dejes caer en tentación...

translation.en: but deliver us from evil.
Stop. Put the body down.
I've already called security. There's nowhere for you to go.
translation.es: Ya llamé a Seguridad. No tiene adónde ir.

translation.en: Now, just stay calm. You don't understand.
DAVE: Megan!
Get off of me! Get off of me!
Please, listen to me!
You've got to destroy her body. GUARD: Get him up!
You're coming with us. Please, listen to me.
translation.es: -Va a venir con nosotros. -Por favor, escúchenme.

translation.en: MAN: Listen. Listen. GUARD: Are you okay?
You have to destroy her body. You've got to destroy her body.
translation.es: Tienen que destruir su cuerpo. Lo tienen que destruir.

translation.en: You don't know what you've done!
You don't know what you-- She's not dead!
translation.es: No saben lo que... ¡No está muerta!

translation.en: DAVE: Stop.
Hello?
ANDREW : Megan, it's Andrew. I just heard what happened. Are you okay?
translation.es: Megan, soy Andrew. Me dijeron lo que pasó. ¿Estás bien?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm fine, but I'm going to have to call you back.
translation.es: Sí, pero voy a tener que llamarte después.

translation.en: Hey, can you open the door?
Hey. Are you okay?
Did that guy hurt you? No. No, not really.
translation.es: -¿Ese tipo te lastimó? -No, no me lastimó.

translation.en: I'm fine. Do you want to call it a night?
I can find someone else to cover your shift.
I'm okay. Seriously, Lisa, I'm fine.
Nobody is going to hold it against you
translation.es: Nadie te lo va a reprochar si quieres largarte de aquí.

translation.en: if you just want to get out of here.
translation.es: Nadie te lo va a reprochar si quieres largarte de aquí. Ya lo sé, pero me quiero quedar. Yo puedo. Quiero hacerlo.

translation.en: I know. But I want to stay. Okay? I can do this. I want to do this.
translation.es: Ya lo sé, pero me quiero quedar. Yo puedo. Quiero hacerlo.

translation.en: But you don't have to. Lisa.
I need to do this.
What is it?
I know this is going to sound insane, but...
translation.es: Sé que va a parecer una locura, pero...

translation.en: I heard a corpse breathe.
Breathe? Yes.
Like...
an exhale.
Corpses expunge air sometimes when they're moved.
translation.es: Los cadáveres expulsan aire a veces cuando los mueven.

translation.en: Dr. Lewis didn't tell you this?
translation.es: ¿El Dr. Lewis no te lo dijo?

translation.en: In his defense, he...
probably assumed I was smart enough to know that corpses can't breathe.
translation.es: ...de suponer que yo sabía que los cadáveres no respiran.

translation.en: Are you hungry?
I can get us some take- out from the cafeteria.
translation.es: Puedo ordenar algo de la cafetería.

translation.en: Sure. Okay, come on.
You know, when that guy attacked me tonight...
translation.es: Cuando ese tipo me atacó esta noche...

translation.en: my first instinct wasn't to run.
You know, I wanted to defend myself,
to stop him.
I didn't freeze.
Why couldn't I have done that when there was a gun pointed at my partner?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no pude hacer eso cuando le apuntaron un arma a mi compañero?

translation.en: And then none of this would have happened.
Look, it's just one step at a time.
translation.es: Hay que dar un paso a la vez.

translation.en: This job is the next step.
translation.es: Este empleo es el siguiente paso.

translation.en: Hey. Hey.
There is a cop upstairs who wants to talk to you.
translation.es: Un policía arriba quiere hablar contigo.

translation.en: I can cover down here if you want. Yeah. Yeah, okay.
translation.es: -Te cubro aquí si quieres. -Sí, está bien.

translation.en: How's your arm? Oh, it's good as new.
Do you want some fries?
Sure. Thanks. LISA: Here. See you.
You didn't have to come here. They already have my statement.
translation.es: No hacía falta que vinieras. Ya tienen mi declaración.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I was in the area.
Are you okay? He didn't hurt you?
Just my ego. Did you I.D. him yet?
No, he's not talking.
We'll know more once we get him to the station.
translation.es: Sabremos más cuando lo lleven a la estación.

translation.en: You seem anxious.
Are you staying through the night?
That's the plan.
I just know how you get when you're stressed.
translation.es: Sé cómo reaccionas cuando te estresas.

translation.en: Okay, look, I appreciate you coming here, but I've got things covered.
translation.es: Gracias por venir, pero tengo todo bajo control

translation.en: Is there something else?
I know this isn't the right time...
translation.es: Sé que no es el mejor momento...

translation.en: but when I picked up my stuff, there was something missing.
translation.es: ...pero cuando recogí mis cosas, faltaba algo.

translation.en: A bottle of Xanax.
And you're assuming that I...
what, stole them from you?
Did you?  It's a valid question.
You're not supposed to be around
controlled medications of any kind.
translation.es: No debes tener medicinas controladas. Pierdes unas pastillas, ¿y supones que yo...?

translation.en: You misplace a bottle of pills and automatically assume this.
translation.es: Pierdes unas pastillas, ¿y supones que yo...?

translation.en: Why are you getting so defensive? I'm not getting defensive. I'm getting pissed.
translation.es: -¿Por qué te pones a la defensiva? -No estoy a la defensiva. ¡Estoy enojada!

translation.en: You know, it's as if you're completely incapable of giving me the benefit of the doubt.
translation.es: Es como si fueras incapaz de darme el beneficio de la duda.

translation.en: If you ever need my help, I'm just a call away. Okay?
translation.es: Si alguna vez necesitas mi ayuda solo llámame, ¿sí?

translation.en: Actually, there is something you can help me with. I'll be right back.
translation.es: De hecho, sí puedes ayudarme con algo. Regreso enseguida.

translation.en: Hey.
How's it going? I'm good. How are you?
I'll just be another minute if that's okay.
Yeah, no problem. Take your time.
translation.es: No hay problema. Tómate tu tiempo.

translation.en: Bases loaded, three- and- two count, down by three.
translation.es: Bases llenas, tres bolas, dos strikes, abajo por tres.

translation.en: The stakes could not be higher.
Here comes the pitch. It's a heater.
translation.es: Ahí viene el lanzamiento. Una bola rápida.

translation.en: It's a grand slam!
Can you run these for me at the station?
The scanner broke down before I could run her prints.
translation.es: El escáner se averió antes de poder rastrear sus huellas.

translation.en: Her? Hannah Grace.
ANDREW: You already have her I.D.
I think that I.D. is fake. The picture on her license doesn't match.
translation.es: Creo que es falsa. La foto en su licencia no es de ella.

translation.en: Her eye color, it's different.
translation.es: El color de los ojos es diferente.

translation.en: What? Once a cop...
Just get me the prints, okay?
You got it.
Dave?
I mean, seriously.
Dave?
Hello?
Dave, is that you?
Are you sure you gave me the right prints?
translation.es: ¿Segura que me diste las huellas correctas?

translation.en: Positive. The results are odd.
Why do you say that?
Because according to the prints, Hannah Grace has been dead for three months.
translation.es: Según las huellas, Hannah Grace murió hace tres meses.

translation.en: It must be a glitch in the system. It wouldn't be the first time.
translation.es: Debe de ser una falla del sistema. No sería la primera vez.

translation.en: Is everything else okay?
Yeah, thanks.
Wait, what?
Hey, Dave, where the hell are you, man?
Is everything all right?
The security cameras downstairs... Yeah?
translation.es: Las cámaras de Seguridad de abajo...

translation.en: Can I access the morgue footage?
translation.es: ¿Puedo acceder a los videos de la morgue?

translation.en: I can't leave the desk unmanned, but...
translation.es: No puedo dejar la recepción, pero...

translation.en: here you go.
Thanks.
Oh, my God.
Come on, Megan. Just breathe.
Hey, can I talk to you for a sec?
Yeah. Excuse me.
So, I thought I saw someone in the bathroom.
translation.es: Creí haber visto a alguien en el baño.

translation.en: When I went to check the security footage,
translation.es: Cuando fui a ver los videos de Seguridad...

translation.en: I mean, I could have sworn it was her.
Meg, who is her? What are you talking about?
I need to show you something.
There.
What is that?
I don't know.
Well, I mean, it looks like a shadow. It's not a shadow.
translation.es: -Digo, parece una sombra. -No es una sombra.

translation.en: Look, when that guy broke in...
translation.es: Mira, cuando ese tipo se metió...

translation.en: he kept talking about the woman he killed...
translation.es: ...no dejaba de hablar de la mujer que mató.

translation.en: Hannah Grace, how she wasn't really dead.
translation.es: Hannah Grace. Y que en realidad no estaba muerta.

translation.en: I looked her up. She died three months ago during an exorcism.
translation.es: La investigué. Se murió hace tres meses durante un exorcismo.

translation.en: You know I don't believe in that kind of stuff, but...
translation.es: Sabes que no creo en ese tipo de cosas, pero...

translation.en: ...this, to me, is not a shadow.
translation.es: ...para mí, eso no es una sombra.

translation.en: What is this?
Lisa, I didn't take any.
Are you lying to me? No, okay?
You need to believe me on this one.
translation.es: Escucha, tienes que creerme esta vez.

translation.en: I promise you, I didn't take any. I wanted to, but I didn't.
translation.es: Te juro que no las tomé. Quería, pero no lo hice.

translation.en: I've just had them in my bag for comfort. I promise.
translation.es: Las tenía en el bolso para confortarme. Te lo juro.

translation.en: Meg, do you...?
Do you remember when we were in meetings
and they started talking about coping mechanisms?
Yeah.
An addict's brain tries to find new ways to cope with stress.
translation.es: El cerebro del adicto busca cómo lidiar con el estrés.

translation.en: Everything that has happened to you today,
translation.es: Todo lo que te ha pasado hoy...

translation.en: the stress that it has caused,
your brain is desperate to find a way to cope with it.
translation.es: ...tu cerebro está desesperado por buscar la manera de manejarlo.

translation.en: And it is going to do anything it can to convince you to use again.
translation.es: Hará todo lo posible para convencerte de usar drogas.

translation.en: My brain did not put a corpse on the security footage.
translation.es: Mi cerebro no puso un cadáver en el video de Seguridad.

translation.en: Look, I don't know what that thing is,
translation.es: Yo no sé lo que es esa cosa.

translation.en: but what I do know is you're jumping to the least plausible explanation.
translation.es: Pero estás aceptando la explicación menos probable...

translation.en: And right now you've got to focus.
So, don't see things that aren't there.
translation.es: No veas cosas que no son reales.

translation.en: Here. No.
Just take them. No.
I trust you.
Dave?
Are you okay?
COMPUTER: Intake bay.
RANDY: I brought you a present.
Can you give me a hand again? Sorry. I can't help you out.
translation.es: -¿Me ayudas de nuevo? -Perdón. No puedo ayudarte.

translation.en: Not after last time. What? Why? What happened?
translation.es: -No después de la última vez. -¿Por qué? ¿Qué pasó?

translation.en: You wouldn't believe me if I told you.
translation.es: No me creerías si te lo dijera.

translation.en: Okay. Well, try me.
MEGAN: So, it's obviously been a long night...
translation.es: Ha sido una noche muy larga...

translation.en: and I'm probably just remembering things wrong.
translation.es: ...y probablemente no esté recordando bien las cosas.

translation.en: She had a huge wound...
going down this side of her abdomen when you dropped her off. Correct?
translation.es: ...en el costado del abdomen cuando la bajaste. ¿Correcto?

translation.en: Yeah, I could have sworn that she did.
translation.es: Sí, podría jurar que la tenía.

translation.en: So, where is it now?
And her arm was banged up too, right?
Yeah. Have you checked the admittance photos?
The camera broke down and when I tried to scan her prints, the scanner died too.
translation.es: Falló la cámara y cuando traté de escanear sus huellas, el escáner falló.

translation.en: That's weird.
So, I had a friend run her prints at the police station.
translation.es: Le pedí a un amigo que rastreara sus huellas en la comisaría.

translation.en: And?
Hannah Grace, she died three months ago during an exorcism.
translation.es: Hannah Grace. Murió hace tres meses durante un exorcismo.

translation.en: Whoa. When that man broke in, he said she wasn't really dead,
translation.es: Cuando ese hombre se metió, dijo que no estaba realmente muerta.

translation.en: and now it's almost like she's healing herself.
translation.es: Ahora es como si se estuviera sanando.

translation.en: Can I ask you a personal question?
How personal?
Why are you working the night shift at a morgue?
translation.es: ¿Por qué trabajas de noche en una morgue?

translation.en: Because it's my job. No, no. You're smart and resourceful.
translation.es: -Porque es mi empleo. -No. Eres lista y muy capaz.

translation.en: So, what happened?
You know what? Actually, it's not even-- I'm sorry. It's not my business.
I had a rough patch a few years back and...
translation.es: Pasé por un mal momento hace unos años y...

translation.en: I don't know, I guess I thought I saw that in you.
translation.es: No sé. Creí que te pasaba lo mismo.

translation.en: I'm sure that there is a rational explanation for all of this.
translation.es: Seguro que hay una explicación racional.

translation.en: You just-- Megan, you've got to be careful
translation.es: Solo... Ten mucho cuidado de no volverte loca aquí.

translation.en: that you don't drive yourself crazy here.
translation.es: Ten mucho cuidado de no volverte loca aquí.

translation.en: I know.
He's adorable.
I used to have a drinking problem.
And I would get drunk...
and lie and cheat and...
people told me that I was a dick sometimes.
translation.es: ...la gente me decía que era un imbécil a veces.

translation.en: All the time.
And then...
this guy shows up...
and he made me want to be a better person.
So...
I quit drinking...
I quit lying...
and then I was finally able to be honest with the people that love me...
translation.es: Por fin pude ser honesto con las personas que me aman...

translation.en: because I was finally able to be honest with myself.
translation.es: ...porque por fin pude ser honesto conmigo mismo.

translation.en: If you ever want to talk, I'm the guy.
translation.es: Si alguna vez quieres hablar, soy el indicado.

translation.en: Thank you.
Have a good night. You, too. Get home safe.
translation.es: -Que tengas buena noche. -Tú también. Ve con cuidado.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Intake bay.
Hey, I was just about to call you.
translation.es: Hola. Estaba a punto de llamarte.

translation.en: That bottle of Xanax that you were looking for...
translation.es: Esa botella de Xanax que estabas buscando...

translation.en: I didn't take it.
Megan, you already told me this.
I found it in the medicine cabinet after you moved out.
translation.es: La encontré en el botiquín del baño después de que te mudaste.

translation.en: And I should have packed it up with the rest of your things...
translation.es: Debí haberla empacado con el resto de tus cosas, pero...

translation.en: but I kept it.
I've just been feeling anxious lately...
and I felt safer knowing that they were there.
translation.es: Me sentía más tranquila sabiendo que las tenía.

translation.en: You know, in case I needed them.
Why are you telling me this?
Because I'm tired of lying.
Anyway, I'll drop them off tomorrow morning if you're there.
translation.es: Te las llevo mañana temprano, si vas a estar.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll be there. I'm glad you told me, okay?
translation.es: Sí, voy a estar. Me alegro de que me lo dijeras.

translation.en: Me, too. Bye. Bye.
COMPUTER: Going down.
This is Randy, drop- off complete.
Goddamn it.
Randy?
Oh, my God.
Megan, go to security right now.
translation.es: Avisa a Seguridad ahora mismo. El tipo que se metió en la morgue...

translation.en: The guy who broke into the morgue killed the two officers
translation.es: Avisa a Seguridad ahora mismo. El tipo que se metió en la morgue... ...mató a los dos oficiales que lo llevaban a la estación.

translation.en: transporting him to the station.
translation.es: ...mató a los dos oficiales que lo llevaban a la estación.

translation.en: We have an APB out on him, but there's a chance he could make--
translation.es: Lo están buscando, pero es posible que vaya...

translation.en: Move. ANDREW: Megan?
Open it.
Get the lift.
Do you see what's happening to her body?
translation.es: ¿Ves lo que le está pasando a su cuerpo?

translation.en: She's healing.
She heals herself by killing people and then she rests.
translation.es: Se sana matando a personas y luego descansa.

translation.en: Why hasn't she killed you?
I don't know.
I believe you.
There's something evil hiding inside.
The church...
said to walk away...
but I couldn't give up on my only child.
translation.es: ...pero no podía abandonar a mi única hija.

translation.en: That's your daughter?
Not anymore.
Hannah struggled with depression...
anxiety.
It worked on her...
day after day...
till it broke her...
...found its way inside her body.
Is that when her eye changed?
Yeah.
That's the demon's mark.
No matter how many exorcisms they performed, it stayed.
translation.es: Sin importar cuántos exorcismos le hicieron, permaneció ahí.

translation.en: One last...
...attempt.
In the name of God, in the name of Jesus Christ...
translation.es: En el nombre de Dios, en el nombre de Jesucristo...

translation.en: our Lord, be gone!
You have to understand...
...I did what I did...
...to save the lives of others.
But the demon was too powerful.
translation.es: Pero el demonio era muy poderoso.

translation.en: It stayed.
The next day, when we went to bury her...
translation.es: Al día siguiente, cuando íbamos a sepultarla...

translation.en: ...her body, it disappeared from the mortuary.
Four people were dead.
We have to get her to the incinerator.
The knife wasn't enough.
The only way to destroy this thing is to burn her.
translation.es: La única manera de destruir esta cosa es quemándola.

translation.en: Anything else just slows her down.
translation.es: Cualquier otra cosa solo la detiene un poco.

translation.en: Come and get me!
No! Stop!
Stop!
Come on. Come on.
COMPUTER: Mezzanine.
COMPUTER: Going up.
COMPUTER: Arrived at mezzanine.
Officer Kurtz, reporting a 10- 65.
I need backup at Boston Metro Hospital, possible homicide.
translation.es: Necesito apoyo en el hospital Metropolitano, posible homicidio.

translation.en: COMPUTER: Arrived at morgue.
Megan?
Oh, my God.
Oh, my God.
Fuck.
Who's there? It's Officer Kurtz.
Megan's friend. Where is she? Yeah, I don't know.
Dave's missing, too.
Everything's down. What's going on down here?
translation.es: No funciona nada. ¿Qué está pasando aquí?

translation.en: Oh, God.
ANDREW: Megan. Andrew. Oh, my God.
What happened? We have to get out of here.
ANDREW: What the hell is that?
Come on.
What? Oh, my God. Come on! Come on!
COMPUTER: Going down.
Hey, stop!
Let him go!
Andrew. Are you okay?
MEGAN: Okay, come on. Hurry. We don't have much time.
Go get help. Wait. What? Megan.
No! Help me, please!
MEGAN: I'm 62 days clean...
...and I'm thankful for how far I've come.
translation.es: Agradezco lo mucho que he avanzado.

translation.en: It's not easy.
And I know I have a long way to go...
but I'm feeling stronger every day.
translation.es: ...pero me siento más fuerte cada día.

translation.en: Nothing's going to stop me now.
translation.es: Nada me va a detener ahora.
